name: Saigon Around
description:
Saigon Around tour will bring you to both the popular sights and also to the less talked about ones at a leisurely pace. In this tour, you will know about Saigon's culture as revealed by our entertaining and knowledgeble guide. At each stop, you will get plenty of opportunities to appreciate the sights and take many memorable photos. We also don't take you to the typical tourist trap to sell you overpriced souvernirs. 
 We offer you two time options for you to choose with the same price :
